comments.raw_text: Where is Firefox installed? Where is your profile stored? What is the CPU used %?
comments.creator: fmdevelopertim@gmail.com
comments.author: fmdevelopertim@gmail.com
comments.text: Where is Firefox installed? Where is your profile stored? What is the CPU used %?

comments.raw_text:
firefox installed 
c:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\

and profile located
c:\Users\Admin\AppData\Roaming\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\

CPU using %35-53
